subtitles.text: This is the new night time. I dare you to wear this silver retro design now, right?
Cute face, isn't it? Nighttime and idols!
Yes, I know, I don't have much fun to talk about, but this is the end of the show. Thank you very much.
Now, please listen to the announcement from Mr. Hori.
Yes, it will be performed at Tokyo Kinema Club on Wednesday, September 6,
I will be performing in "Tokyo Yakan Land Vol. 3: Rose of Uguisudani" at Tokyo Kinema Club on Wednesday, September 6.
There are many performers here, and Haruna-san, formerly of Takoyaki de Iimono, will be next to me,
Yes, that's right. What do you think? Have you talked about this or something in particular? Yes, I have. There is also Haruna, who is more glorious and beautiful.
How is it? Have you talked about this in particular?

I'm looking forward to it.

What kind of show is this?
It's a show where I make an obanzai-style rice dish that goes well with sake.
And drink it while eating it.
So it's about drinking at the end?
Yes, because I like to drink.
So you did this for me.
We arranged the drinks and compared them.

If they answered correctly, they got cookies.
I drew the illustrations.

Yes, I'm having fun with everyone. It's great!

Tea!
Today's tea is a blend of herbs to soothe your throat!
It smells so good!

Wow!

It's easy to drink, even though it's an herbal tea.
